sense.def: grill or fry; heat up intensely

tls:text.tls:line: to heat a tube of mercury,429
to heat a tube of mercury,429
didn't you tell me before

sense.def: in good time, at an early stage; at an earlier stage, at a sufficiently early stage

tls:text.tls:line: Then Wei plotted with a friend to make her give in by beating her with bamboo.
Then Wei plotted with a friend to make her give in by beating her with bamboo.
Then Wei plotted with a friend to make her give in by beating her with bamboo.
Then Wei plotted with a friend to make her give in by beating her with bamboo.
Then Wei plotted with a friend to make her give in by beating her with bamboo.
Wei kept up his pressure, however,

sense.def: encroach on, exert pressure on; exert undue pressure on (those above or below)

tls:text.tls:line: She could also wash the childs head.
She could also wash the childs head.
she sat down and sacrificed on the bed.

sense.def: a bed 於床 and not necessarily 於床上

tls:text.tls:line: But [the family] got an old dog
and beat it to death.
